name: Gumbowl's Adventure
description:
descriptionGumbowl’s Adventure is a 2D Platformer with loads of stuff to explore. You play as the main character “Gumbowl” and your goal is to find him some more gumballs. You will meet all of Gumbowl’s friends who are eager to help you through… whatever necessary to get you those gumballs. I wish you luck on your journey!

features
  • Rhythm Games
  • Parkour
  • Exploration
  • story
  • Boss Battles
  • A Whole Lot Of Caves
